kitisriworaphan.putthipong.lab4

Class DisplayMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • kitisriworaphan.putthipong.lab4.DisplayMatrix

  • public class DisplayMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This program accepts a matrix and then displays it in different ways.
    Version:
    1.0, 13/01/2023
    Author:
    Putthipong Kitisriworaphan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisplayMatrix() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void inputMatrix()
      This method will reads the number of rows and columns and then repeatedly asks the user to enter each element in the matrix.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method will run the DisplayMatrix program by accepts a matrix and displays in different ways.
      static void showMatrix()
      This method displays the original matrix that has been entered.
      static void showMatrixByColumn()
      This method displays the matrix by column.
      static void showMatrixByColumnBackward()
      This method displays the matrix by column in reverse order.
      static void showMatrixByDiagonalTopLeftBottomRight()
      This method displays the diagonal elements of the matrix from the top left to the bottom right.
      static void showMatrixByDiagonalTopRightBottomLeft()
      This method displays the diagonal elements of the matrix from the top right to the bottom left.
      static void showMatrixByRow()
      This method displays the matrix by row.
      static void showMatrixByRowBackward()
      This method displays the matrix by row in reverse order.
      static void showMatrixByRowZigzag()
      This method displays the matrix by row in zigzag order.
